title: Power went out
body: My power went out during a ranked game and now I'm in a low priority que and have to wait 20 before it allows me to find a match, is there anyway to have this removed? I had no control over the situation.

replies.body: We wouldn't be able to remove this, no :(  The system works like this essentially because there's not really a way for us to tell whether or not this kind of disconnection was intentional or not (example: Router failed vs. Turned off intentionally). There shouldn't be any long lasting effects unless this is a consistent issue.
